snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization VII Gameplay Reveal - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
Firaxis Games dropped a Gameplay Trailer for Sid Meier's Civilization VII during the Future Games Show at Gamescom. It's coming to PC and consoles on February 11, 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #civilization7
